item.title: Job Performance Scales: LDA Topic Modeling
item.description: Data Setup This is the part where I am importing the data. I choose to combine the STEM and the ITEM so both parts of the scale were included. I also collapse the scales by citation, so each document is a full scale rather than a part of a scale. job_perf <- read_excel("/project/class/bii_sdad_dspg/uva/dod_ari2/DSPG-ARI2 -- Performance Item and Scale Database.xlsx", sheet = "Performance Items") job_perf <- job_perf %>% filter(CITATION != "Borman, W.
